Package de.chojo.sadu.adapter

Class StaticQueryAdapter

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.adapter.StaticQueryAdapter
public class StaticQueryAdapter
extends Object
The StaticQueryAdapter class provides a static interface for executing queries using a query builder. It allows for initializing the adapter with a data source and configuration, and provides methods for building query stages.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static QueryStage<Void> builder()
    Creates a new query builder instance without specifying the model class.

  • Method Details

    • builder

      public static QueryStage<Void> builder()
      Creates a new query builder instance without specifying the model class. This version of the builder is typically used for non-model specific queries.
      Returns:
      a query builder instance for non-model specific queries
      Throws:
      de.chojo.sadu.adapter.StaticQueryAdapter.NotInitializedException - if the adapter has not been initialized

    • builder

      public static <T> QueryStage<T> builder​(Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a new query builder instance.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the model
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class of the model for which the queries will be built
      Returns:
      a query builder instance for the specified model class
      Throws:
      de.chojo.sadu.adapter.StaticQueryAdapter.NotInitializedException - if the adapter has not been initialized

    • init

      public static void init​(DataSource dataSource, QueryBuilderConfig config)
      Initializes the static SADU query adapter.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - the data source used for executing queries
      config - the configuration for the query builder
      Throws:
      de.chojo.sadu.adapter.StaticQueryAdapter.AlreadyInitializedException - if the adapter has already been initialized

    • init

      public static void init​(DataSource dataSource)
      Initializes the static SADU query adapter.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - the data source used for executing queries
      Throws:
      de.chojo.sadu.adapter.StaticQueryAdapter.AlreadyInitializedException - if the adapter has already been initialized
